description: Check oil level and top up if necessary before operation.
Change lubricating oil for the first time.
Clean cooling water suction hole during boat lifting.
Lubricate and re-tighten propeller shaft nut during boat lifting.
Inspect and replace anode during boat lifting.
Inspect rubber diaphragm for water tightness.
Replace the flexible mount.
Check lubricating oil level and fill if necessary before operation.

description: Replace the flexible mount and inspect/test seal sensor every 7 years.

source_details.section_title: Ask your authorized YANMAR marine dealer or distributor for help

description: Check coolant level daily.
Check or replace the seawater pump impeller every 50 hours.
Replace coolant every 250 hours or annually, if Long Life Coolant is used replace every 2 years.
Clean intake silencer (air cleaner) element every 250 hours.
Clean or replace the exhaust/water mixing elbow every 250 hours.
parts_required: exhaust/water mixing elbow (if replacement is needed)

description: Check the alarm and indicators daily.
Check the electrolyte level in the battery every 50 hours.
Adjust the tension of the alternator V-ribbed belt or replace V-ribbed belt initially at 50 hours and then every 250 hours.
Check the wiring connectors every 250 hours.
Check for leakage of fuel, engine oil, and engine coolant daily.
Adjust intake/exhaust valve clearance at the first 50 hours and then as needed.
Check the remote control cable operation initially at 50 hours and then as needed.
Adjust the propeller shaft alignment initially at 50 hours and then as needed.
Replace rubberized hoses (fuel and water) every 2 years.
Check oil level and top up if necessary
